Description: EWS is Banking application to assess wether the customer will failure to repay a debt or is a superior customer. In this apps has approval flow, reporting, tracking, and tracing.
Digisales is Banking application for sales activity automation such as customer management, monitoring all sales activity until debt collection, and open account any kind of products.
TechStack: .Net Core,Swagger,SQL Server,Agile,Banking SOA Integration,IIS Web Server,Microservices

Description: CSMT is a Banking application for monitoring business planning until realization. In this app has approval flows, reporting, and tracking business plan.

BranchNav is a Banking application which shows important information includes business aspect, operational aspect, risk & compliance aspect, service aspect, premise aspect, and online supervision. The function of these aspects contained in a number of operational monitoring features, the modules are credit performance, distribution of people's business credit, outlet rental data, ATM rental data, audit findings, revitalization, FAQ, handbook, BRO data, and branch profile.

BAMS Home is a web portal which has an authentication process which allows a user to access multiple applications with one set of login credentials (Single Sign-On). In BAMS Home users can access multiple resources (client app) connected to a local area network (LAN) or Internet. BAMS Home provides application management and user management,  with relevant roles user can manage applications (modules of business activity management tools) and users.

CPR is a Banking application (tools) for business to determine the profitability of each customer or segments of customers, by attributing profits and costs to each customer separately and simulate customer profits based on products which chosen, can be compared with customer historical data. CPR can be applied at the individual customer level or at the level of customer aggregates / groups

Artworkfairs.com (self-project) is a social commerce (C2C & B2C) platform which focus on digital art products. In Artworkfairs user can competed & get much rewards and badges, sell art, buy art, and recruit artist.
e-Office is a electronic office application, facilitate employee to do office activity such as attendance, leave request, and more.
TechStack: .Net Framework MVC,SQL Server,IIS Web Server,Monolith,SOA Integration

Description: yudafatah.com is a portfolio and blog web app.
TechStack: .Net Core(Migrate to Go),SQL Server(Migrate to MongoDB),Shared-Hosting,Microservices,ReactJs(Migrate to Blazor)

Description: BNI Travel provide any banking and partners information such as merchant location and discount consist of hotel, restaurant, tourist attraction, and Micro small and Medium Enterprises.
Biometric Integrated System Admin Web provides approvals process, tracing and tracking of enrollment and verification fingerprint sensors to hardware integrators, software and database.
Mudik CSR is a web app, provides employee homecoming submission, reporting, tracing, and tracking.
Increase Collateral Auction Apllication web service security in transfering data.
Attendance application is android based app using NFC sensor in smart watch and web based app for admin side to generate report.
TechStack: .Net Core,SQL Server,IIS Web Server,Three Tier, Kotlin, Android

Description: Smart-CA (Credit Application) is an end-to-end application related to credit applications for medium and small segments. This application is used by RM (Relationship Managers) throughout Indonesia to process loans and analyze business debtors in the middle and small segments.
TechStack: .Net Framework MVC,SQL Server,IIS Web Server,Two Tier, Monolith
